terms_intro: Welcome to TheraLink. These Terms and Conditions govern your access to and use of our services. By using our platform, you agree to abide by these Terms in full.
terms_use_text: Our services are intended for personal, non-commercial use. You agree not to misuse, modify, copy, or disrupt the platform. Any unauthorized use, including attempts to interfere with security or performance, is strictly prohibited.
terms_account_text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. Any activity that occurs under your account will be deemed your responsibility.
terms_liability_text: TheraLink provides AI-driven support and does not replace licensed professional medical or mental health care. We are not liable for any actions, outcomes, or decisions you make based on use of our services.
terms_changes_text: We reserve the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes have been posted indicates your acceptance of the revised Terms.
terms_termination_text: We may suspend or terminate your access to the platform if you breach these Terms or misuse the service.
terms_contact_text: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at support@theralink.com.
privacy_intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and the measures we take to protect your data.
privacy_collect_text: We may collect account details (such as your name and email), session data, and usage statistics. Sensitive information shared during sessions is treated as confidential.
privacy_use_text: We use collected data to provide, maintain, and improve our services. This includes personalizing your experience, ensuring platform functionality, and supporting safety and security.
privacy_share_text: We do not sell or rent your personal information. Data may only be shared with trusted third-party providers when necessary to deliver services (e.g., hosting) or when required by law.
privacy_protect_text: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to safeguard your information. However, no online system can guarantee absolute security.
privacy_retention_text: We retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, or as required by law.
privacy_changes_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. You will be notified of significant changes, and continued use of the platform will indicate acceptance.
privacy_contact_text: For privacy-related questions, concerns, or requests, please contact us at support@theralink.com.
subscribe_text: Unlock unlimited chat & call sessions for only
